dashboard.title: Client Acquisition Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Ready to convert more leads today?

quickActions.campaignSubtitle: Start converting leads with targeted outreach
quickActions.linkedinSubtitle: Expand your reach with professional networking

hero.title: Your AI Sales Team, Ready in Seconds.
hero.subtitle: Rarity Leads automates the entire top-of-funnel, from finding and qualifying leads to booking meetings. Scale your revenue, not your headcount.

features.title: The End of Manual Prospecting
features.aiSalesRepSubtitle: Deploy an AI agent that identifies ideal customers, engages them in human-like conversations, and qualifies their interest—so your team only talks to meeting-ready leads.
features.automatedOutreachSubtitle: Connect with prospects across any channel—WhatsApp, LinkedIn, & Email. Our AI crafts and sends personalized follow-ups at the perfect time, ensuring no opportunity is missed.
features.intelligenceSubtitle: Move beyond vanity metrics. Rarity analyzes your entire sales funnel, providing actionable insights to optimize campaigns, lower acquisition costs, and maximize your return.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Unfair Advantage?
cta.subtitle: Join high-growth companies that trust Rarity Leads to build their sales pipeline on autopilot.
